email.title: DoC Well-being
email.text:
Hey!
The EDCC meeting for DoC is coming up on Wednesday to discuss what can be done to improve student well-being.
If you have any ideas or issues that you would like to convey, **please fill out this short survey https://bit.ly/34oRIcW** (it is completely anonymous) or you can message the well-being rep, Arjun (arjun.banerjee18@imperial.ac.uk), directly with ideas.
